title: MAK 2T
desc: New Generation Semi-Synthetic, low smoke, environment friendly engine oil for 2 or 3 wheeler vehicles fitted with two stroke petrol/CNG engines
spec: Reduces spark plug fouling and exhaust system deposits

title: MAK Alpha Zenith 5W30
desc: Premium synthetic engine oil for new generation passenger cars running on petrol/diesel/CNG/LPG
spec: Excellent flow ability ensures quick start, better pickup and makes engine run smoother
Potential for better fuel economy without compromising engine life
Enhanced wear protection even under severe operating conditions

title: MAK 4T ScooTech NXT
desc: The next generation 4-stroke engine oil with advance synthetic technology. Specially formulated for gearless scooters
spec: Designed to provide superior lubrication of engine and maximum driving comfort
Quick engine response and increased power output
Better fuel economy through unique Friction Modifier Technology

title: MAK Super Kool
desc: Environment friendly synthetic, long life, antifreeze coolant suitable for use in liquid-cooled IC engines
spec: Ensures effective cooling even with 700 ppm hard water as it does not form any deposits
Protects radiator and engine block from rust and corrosion

title: MAK Evolve Synth 0W20
desc: Premium synthetic petrol engine oil specially formulated for latest generation passenger cars and hybrids requiring low viscosity oil.
spec: Better fuel economy as lower viscometry provides same power output with less fuel
Lower engine oil consumption as the synthetic oil molecules minimize evapuration loss
Offers enhanced protection to emission system components in passenger cars
